page.title: 12EDUCATION
page.content: {SCHOOL LIBRARY SERVICE} Grampian Region Library Service send us books to choose from each term. {SCHOOL SWIMMING} Each week our senior class visits Alford Academy for swimming lessons. At the end of each year we sit distance and survival tests. {SKIING} During winter some senior children visit the Lecht Ski slopes for lessons. Due to small numbers and age ranges the children have difficulty participating in team sports. {SCOTTISH COUNTRY DANCING} The school team is made up from girls in Pr.3 - Pr.7. Despite the differences in age the girls did extremely well in the North East of Scotland Music Festival this year. Kilts are worn at the Festival.
